net.sourceforge.jasa.market
Class MarketFacade

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jasa.market.MarketFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, net.sourceforge.jabm.EventScheduler, Market, QuoteProvider
public class MarketFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sourceforge.jabm.EventScheduler, Market, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

A facade for managing an agent-based market simulation comprising an simulation controller, a market simulation and an auctioneer agent.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
